Big data, artificial intelligence, machine learning and data protection

The document discusses the intersection of big data, artificial intelligence, machine learning, and data protection, focusing on the implications of processing personal data under various regulations such as the Data Protection Act and General Data Protection Regulation. It explores the benefits of big data analytics, fairness, transparency, consent, legitimate interests, contracts, public sector, and purpose limitation.

Key Concepts:

  • Big Data Analytics
  • Data Protection Act
  • General Data Protection Regulation
  • AI application
  • Supervised learning
  • Unsupervised learning
